name: Fiber art statement necklace . couture accessories . one of a kind
description:
To found out how I created this statement necklace and see more photos, please visit my blog http://mgmart.blogspot.com/2010/05/my-creative-space.html 

This statement necklace will be a talking point when you wear it, I am sure!

One Of A Kind

Every flower I create is a reflection of my feelings for that day, so every each of them are unique... 
♥ Marianna 

Designed and handmade by me

I handcut each petals and singed one-by-one.
I handsewn every part of this necklace, no glue been used.
I signed/dated on the back with a fiber marker pen for authenticity of my work. 

All my items are shipped with Registered Priority Mail to Worldwide.

©1986-2011 Marianna G. Mills

name: My Little Bird . adjustable ring . as featured on Bethany Joy Galeotti's blog
description:
as featured on Bethany Joy Galeotti's blog http://www.bjgofficial.com/2010/01/3-cool-things.html
Thank you Joy! 
xo Marianna

.
.
.
Other colors are available, please contact me for details.

Everyones dream to own a little bird...now you can have one, and she will be with you always as long you are looking after her! You can tell her all your secrets, she will always looking at you with her beautiful eyes...

One thing you need to know, she don't like getting wet, as she have real feathers. The little bird is glued on quite well and securely, but it is still a delicate ring and should be worn with caution.

* I only have a limited numbers of this tiny birds, all in different colours with different personalities :) Look out for more in my shop! http://www.etsy.com/search_results_shop.php?search_type=user_shop_ttt_id_6059271&search_query=BIRD 

*This bird is sold and your piece may be slightly different, (but the same colour) from the photo as all of my items are One Of A Kind. It will be as cute as it is on the photos :)

All my items are shipped with Registered Priority Mail to Worldwide.

©1986-2010 Marianna G. Mills

name: PETALS . Purple lover . 2 handmade organza hair flower . bobby pin . hairclip
description:
Romantic handmade hair flowers, perfect for this season.
These flowers are available in many colors, please contact me for details.

Each petals are handcut and hand singed one-by-one.
I handsewn every part of this flowers, no glue been used.
Designed and handmade by me

Flower size approx 1 3/4 inch in diameter 
Pin size just under 2 inches

name: PETALS - Plum Blossom - One Of A Kind Fabric and Swarovski Crystals Statement Necklace
description:
One of a kind handmade organza and taffeta flower statement necklace.

I handcut each petals and singed them one-by-one.
I handsewn every part of this flower, no glue been used.
Designed and handmade by me

The metal bar link neklace is vintage, but never been used. 
This necklace is from my 1980 old stock. So beautiful and rare design.

Flowers size approx 1 1/2 inches in diameter. 

All my items are shipped with Registered Priority Mail to Worldwide.

©1986-2010 Marianna G. Mills
